ygData.subject: Re: hunting spots
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm, if a bunch of evil races jump off a ship, then how do they get back on the ship when they are done at the islands? We have never even seen this ship, is
ygData.messageBody:
hmm, if a bunch of evil races jump off a ship, then how do they get back on
the ship when they are done at the islands? We have never even seen this
ship, is there npc that will kos us?
----- Original Message -----
From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 2:51 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] hunting spots


> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> With one of my other characters...on my way from Kaladim to Freeport...in
> the Ocean of Tears...i noticed and BUNCH of islands with camps and fires
> burning...not too mention that one hill giant swimming towards the
> boat...that was kinda scary.... I would say try out some to the
> islands....i noticed some places along antonica have boats that you can
> take off in., If you could find one....
>
> Korm
> Cazic Thule
>
